name: Ecree
0:
”Alexa open Ecree”
”Is my sentence correct?”
”How am I doing?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ecree
Developer Terms of Use
des: Students who use the Ecree skill will get a range of writing support from Alexa. Ecree’s technology can help students improve sentence-level considerations like grammar, style, and simplification. In addition, students get guidance on more advanced elements of writing like organization and analysis. With the Ecree skill, students can transform their Alexa into an on-demand writing teacher. Ecree is proven to help students increase their writing scores on a range of subjects, assignments, and standardized tests.
